entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9716] It is expected that DefinedBenefitObligationAtPresentValue with a value of 4,784,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.ab-inbev.com/role/PensionAndSimilarObligationsAdditionalInformationDetail, http://www.ab-inbev.com/role/PensionAndSimilarObligationsSummaryOfNetLiabilityForPostEmploymentAndLongTermEmployeeBenefitPlansDetail should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, LiabilityAssetOfDefinedBenefitPlans with the dimension ifrs-full:NetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAssetAxis = ifrs-full:PresentValueOfDefinedBenefitObligationMember and a reported value of 5,403,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.ab-inbev.com/role/PensionAndSimilarObligationsSummaryOfChangesInPresentValueOfDefinedBenefitObligationsAndChangesInFairValueOfPlanAssetsDetail. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:DefinedBenefitObligationAtPresentValue fact are:
Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of DefinedBenefitObligationAtPresentValue : -6 Decimals of LiabilityAssetOfDefinedBenefitPlans : -6 Rule version: 26.0.9 - d899194d20f.htm 34876

property.name: label
property.value: Defined benefit obligation, at present value
